reqs:
Pre-reqs: BIOL 200. (One of BIOL 260 or BIOL 201 recommended.)
Clickers are required for this section.
This is the wait-list for BIOL 361-101. Please do not contact course instructors about registration issues, as course registrations/ wait-lists are managed by the program office. Students are moved in chronological order from the wait-list into the course as space becomes available. Timetables may be modified to allow for conflict-free registration. It is the students responsibility to check SSC for registration changes. Information on wait-list positioning will not be provided.

courseName: Physiology of Sensory, Nervous and Muscular Systems
description: Excitable membranes, neural signaling and transmission; transduction and coding of sensory information; muscle contraction.
